title: Ticket #3487: implement fair sharing in transfer queue
description:
Problem

The new round robin scheduling in the file transfer queue suffers from unfairness. Consider Brian's scenario:

User A has transfers that last 1s and User B has transfers that last 1hr. If the transfer limit is 10 transfers, then after 10s, User B will have all the transfer slots and User A will be starved. This happens because we are giving the next free transfer slot to the user with the least recently started transfer.

Proposed Solution

Give the next transfer to the user with the least number of active transfers. In case of tie, give it to the user with the least recently started transfer.
